translations: 借口；自负；虚荣做作（pretension 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: The play mocks the pretensions of the new middle class.
sentences.translation: 这出戏讽刺了新中产阶级的装模作样。

sentences.sentence: The city has unrealistic pretensions to world-class status.
sentences.translation: 该城市不切实际地声称为世界一流城市。

sentences.sentence: Her wide-eyed innocence soon exposes the pretensions of the art world.
sentences.translation: 她的天真无邪很快就暴露出艺术界的做作。
